Package aa.test.selenium

Class AA06LoginTest

java.lang.Object
aa.test.utils.AASeleniumManager
aa.test.selenium.AA06LoginTest
@TestMethodOrder(org.junit.jupiter.api.MethodOrderer.OrderAnnotation.class) class AA06LoginTest extends AASeleniumManager
Test login and adjacent functionalities - forgot password, invalid login, valid login, logout. Test only the webapp part (not e-mails).

  • Method Details

    • forgotPassword

      @Test @Order(1) void forgotPassword()
       Feature: Test login and adjacent functionalities
 
 Scenario: Forgot password.
 Given the login page is open
 Then click Forgot password
 And go through the forms
 And go back to login

    • invalidLogin

      @Test @Order(2) void invalidLogin()
       Feature: Test login and adjacent functionalities
 
 Scenario: Invalid login.
 Given the login page is open
 Then try to log in with the wrong password
 And assert that the client-snackbar shows the wrong credential message

    • validLogin

      @Test @Order(3) void validLogin()
       Feature: Test login and adjacent functionalities
 
 Scenario: Valid login.
 Given the login page is open
 Then Log in
 And assert URL

    • validLogout

      @Test @Order(4) void validLogout()
       Feature: Test login and adjacent functionalities
 
 Scenario: Valid logout.
 Given the user is logged in
 Then Log out
 And assert URL
